mapper.select: SELECT pi.id, sum(pis.invoice_quantity) invoiceQuantitySum, sum(pis.tax_money)taxMoneySum, sum(pis.invoice_amount)invoiceAmount, pi.invoice_state, pi.invoice_date, pi.invoice_numbers, pi.invoice_supplier, sum(pis.invoice_money) invoiceMoney, fpa.finance_parameter_name currencyName, fpb.finance_parameter_name taxRateName, pi.tax_rate_money, pi.registration, pi.registration_date, pi.invoice_remarks FROM jr_purchase_invoice pi LEFT JOIN jr_purchase_invoice_schedule pis ON ( pi.invoice_numbers = pis.invoice_numbers ) LEFT JOIN jr_finance_parameters fpa ON ( pi.currency_id = fpa.id ) LEFT JOIN jr_finance_parameters fpb ON ( pi.tax_rate_id = fpb.id ) WHERE 1 = 1 AND pi.invoice_numbers = #{invoiceNumbers} GROUP BY pi.invoice_numbers

SELECT pis.id, pis.invoice_date, pis.invoice_code, pis.invoice_use, pis.invoice_name, pis.invoice_specifications, pis.invoice_quantity, pis.tax_price, pis.tax_money, pis.tax_no_price, pis.tax_no_money, pis.invoice_amount, pis.invoice_money, pis.invoice_numbers FROM jr_purchase_invoice_schedule pis WHERE pis.invoice_numbers = #{invoiceNumbers}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jr_purchase_invoice ( invoice_state, invoice_date, invoice_numbers, invoice_supplier, currency_id, tax_rate_id, tax_rate_money, registration, registration_date, invoice_remarks ) VALUES ( #{invoiceState}, #{invoiceDate}, #{invoiceNumbers}, #{invoiceSupplier}, #{currencyId}, #{taxRateId}, #{taxRateMoney}, #{registration}, #{registrationDate}, #{invoiceRemarks} )

INSERT INTO jr_purchase_invoice_schedule ( invoice_date, invoice_code, invoice_use, invoice_name, invoice_specifications, invoice_quantity, tax_price, tax_money, tax_no_price, tax_no_money, invoice_amount, invoice_money, invoice_numbers ) VALUES ( #{invoiceDate}, #{invoiceCode}, #{invoiceUse}, #{invoiceName}, #{invoiceSpecifications}, #{invoiceQuantity}, #{taxPrice}, #{taxMoney}, #{taxNoPrice}, #{taxNoMoney}, #{invoiceAmount}, #{invoiceMoney}, #{invoiceNumbers} )
